climbs.name: Suspended Animation
climbs.fa: Brian Smoot, Les Ellison, Paul Scannel    1983

content.description:
Climb the crack starting on the left side of the Animation wall.  Climb past a fixed pin and then a bolt.  Traverse right and up on the slanting ramp to a two bolt belay on it's far right side.

Pitch 2- Climb up and left to a bolt and then traverse left to a fixed pin to gain a ledge.  Clip another bolt then climb up past a fixed pin to a belay at two bolts.

Rappel the route.
content.protection: Quickdraws, long slings and a selection of smaller cams and nuts.
content.location: Start on the left side of the Animation wall in the obvious crack system.

content.description:
Climb up past two bolts (a bit runout) to gain the ramp in the middle of the wall.  Clip a bolt on the steep wall above the ramp and make a jump move (crux) to reach the face above the ramp.  Climb past two more bolts and finish on Suspended Animation.

Rappel the route.
content.location: This route starts in the middle of the face to the right of the start of Suspended Animation.
